entries.title: Ubisoft is having a bad time, cancels more unannounced games as its share price plunges
entries.description: Today’s Skull and Bones delay was just the tip of the iceberg.

entries.title: Lian Li's just went ahead and made fans cool again
entries.description: Lian Li's hypnotic new fans look like they came from the future.

entries.title: A new MechWarrior game is coming in 2024
entries.description: Piranha Games president Russ Bullock revealed the existence of the new project during a recent podcast.

entries.title: The ending of this survival game is the most tension-filled fun I've had in ages
entries.description: To win Stranded: Alien Dawn you need to rescue each of your survivors from the hostile alien planet. But it's not easy.

entries.title: Deep Rock Galactic sold millions of copies last year, and I reckon its wholesome community is to blame
entries.description: The co-op FPS recently welcomed a VTuber and her fans with open arms and nutritious memes.

entries.title: I can’t believe I’m saying this again but Skull and Bones is delayed again
entries.description: Ubisoft’s high-seas piracy game is now expected to come sometime after April 1.

entries.title: Microsoft reportedly plans to invest $10B into the creator of ChatGPT and DALL-E
entries.description: It seems like Microsoft is ready to spend big on AI.

entries.title: How to cross the Ravine of No Return in One Piece Odyssey
entries.description: Get to the Great Sandy Desert Dunes without the Navi parrot.

entries.title: Modern tech is treading some serious Torment Nexus territory
entries.description: This is the tech sci-fi writers have been warning us about for decades.

entries.title: Corsair's next PSUs could throw out age-old ideas of where connectors should go
entries.description: Some preliminary images suggest Corsair's working on power supplies with an unconventional connector layout.

entries.title: Today, Bungie is finally solving one of Destiny 2's biggest pain points
entries.description: You'll no longer have to wait months to fill out your collection of armor mods.

entries.title: How to change outfits in One Piece Odyssey
entries.description: Swap out your character costumes.

entries.title: This year is stacked with promising FPS games
entries.description: Say hello to the 16 most interesting shooters coming out this year.

entries.title: Marvel Snap's latest update gives credit where it's due
entries.description: A new feature lets you discover the artists behind your favourite cards

entries.title: Gigabit-ready internet connections are now mandatory in new homes in England
entries.description: Plus it's now easier to get connection upgrades installed if you live in a flat with an absentee landlord.

entries.title: Starfield is getting a 'deep dive' showcase, but not until after this month's Xbox/Bethesda livestream
entries.description: Microsoft has confirmed that an Xbox/Bethesda 'Developer Direct' livestream showcase will take place on January 25.

entries.title: The original Zelda in VR would have exploded my 6 year-old brain
entries.description: It's dangerous to go without a headset.

entries.title: The AMD gaming CPUs we've been waiting for launch February 14
entries.description: Yet still no price, and the Ryzen 7 7800X3D doesn't have a base clock.

entries.title: UK government launching public consultation into creation of a 'digital pound'
entries.description: This can only end well.

entries.title: Riot apologises for awful League of Legends cinematic after fan backlash
entries.description: The developer admits it "missed the mark".

entries.title: D&D is getting a live-action TV adaptation from the writer and director of Dodgeball
entries.description: The 8-episode series will air on Paramount+.

entries.title: How to complete the Forgotten Grotto Relics world quest in WoW: Dragonflight
entries.description: This world quest can be buggy so here's how to complete it.

entries.title: PC gaming reaches new heights as Steam Deck owner whips out handheld at 2,500ft
entries.description: Now that's a portable PC.

entries.title: Lost Ark's Witcher crossover begins next week, bringing Geralt, Ciri, Yennefer and others to the game
entries.description: No word yet on whether they'll find that Ark.

entries.title: Watch Intel show off unreleased 6GHz chip in the labs
entries.description: We all know it's the Core i9 13900KS, how about launching it?

entries.title: Logitech Chorus
entries.description: The Index-grade audio upgrade for Meta's affordable headset.

entries.title: Today's Wordle 571 answer and hint for Wednesday, January 11
entries.description: Wordle today: The solution and a hint for the #571 puzzle.

entries.title: Uh oh, people are now using machine learning to cheat in Rocket League
entries.description: A cool AI bot project is being exploited by cheaters, and now players are looking for ways to beat it.
